snippet.title: Apotheker - Coming to Steam November 2020!
snippet.description:
Apotheker is a unique story-based logic puzzle game where you must learn the delicate art of potion-brewing. Meet a cast of colorful clientele and balance the effects of your brew using a variety of ingredients and tools, each sending your potion closer to the boiling point. Hone your skills and pick your specialty - will you be a worshipped healer, or a deadly poisoner? Unravel the mysteries of the city and discover all of the intricacies the magic of science has to offer!

Wishlist the game on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1429950/Apotheker/

Visit our website for more information: http://pinedrakegames.com/apotheker.html

Follow our Twitter for development updates: https://twitter.com/PineDrake
